# cmccloudv2_certificate (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get container registry by id
data "cmccloudv2_certificate" "cert_1" {  
    certificate_id = "fe416a11-c03a-4a34-8874-632ba0324941"
}

# get container registry by name
data "cmccloudv2_certificate" "cert_2" {  
    name = "cert-a49t"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `certificate_id` (String) Id of the certificate
- `name` (String) Filter by name of certificate, match exactly

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `secret_ref` (String)
